document_data.name: Disciples of the Changeless Face
document_data.orgname: the Disciples of the Changeless Face
document_data.mainbody: The '''Disciples of the Changeless Face''' was monastic order devoted to [[Grumbar]], the King of the Land Below the Roots.
document_data.Organization: Members of this order were quite stoic, hence their name. They were tasked with preserving the knowledge of how things were in order to better recognize changes over time that could be countered.
